title: Adam Rooks
text:
Adam Rooks (born 15 January 2000) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays in the for <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">RFL Championship</a>.
Background.
Rooks was born in <a href="Kingston%20upon%20Hull">Kingston upon Hull</a>, <a href="East%20Riding%20of%20Yorkshire">East Riding of Yorkshire</a>, <a href="England">England</a>.
He played for Holderness Vikings Skirlaugh and east hull, along with England against France and wales winning both.
Family.
Rooks changed from the terraces to the pitch with <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a> as he and his family are big supporters of the team, from his grandmother to his little sister they all have a passion for the club. 
Rugby all started off because of his father getting him into it at a very young age, edging him in to join the club <a href="Holderness%20Vikings">Holderness Vikings</a> since then he fell in love with it and decided that was what he wanted to do with his life. He was scouted after moving from <a href="Skirlaugh%20A.R.L.F.C.">Skirlaugh ARLFC</a> to <a href="East%20Hull%20A.R.L.F.C.">East Hull</a> and then onto the <a href="City%20Of%20Hull%20Academy">City Of Hull Academy</a> which before that he represented his country against <a href="Wales%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Wales</a> and <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a>, playing for <a href="England%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">England</a>’s under 15’s and 16’s
Playing career.
Early career.
Rooks played his <a href="amateur">amateur</a> <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> for East Hull and the Skirlaugh Bulls, going onto then become a product of the City of Hull Academy System,} along with being in the under 15's and 16's for England.
Rooks has represented his home county of Yorkshire at Origin level and the England Academy Squad at international level.
Playing positions.
He primarily plays in the , but he can also play as a , , and as a .
Senior career.
Hull Kingston Rovers (2018)
Bradford Bulls (2020)
2018.
In July 2018, Rooks signed a two-year contract to play for <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>.
2019.
Rooks made his <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a>' début at the age of 19 on 17 March 2019, in a 16-18 round 7 <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> defeat by the <a href="Catalans%20Dragons">Catalans Dragons</a> at <a href="Craven%20Park%2C%20Hull">Craven Park</a>.
2020.
Adam has been sent on loan for a season to <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> scoring twice. He’s in the first team for the bulls securing a place in almost every match, apart from injury time out.
